# markupText

**Instance Property**

The HTML markup text for the print formatter.

## Declaration

```swift
var markupText: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When drawing begins for the print job, you cannot change the value of this property. The delegate method [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInteractionControllerDelegate/printInteractionControllerWillStartJob(_:)] is called immediately before the formatting is set for the job.

## Related Documentation

- **init(markupText:)**: Returns a markup-text print formatter initialized with an HTML string.
